Bringing in the data

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")
rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  select(
    boro, zipcode, cuisine_description, grade, critical_flag) %>%
  mutate(boro = as.factor(boro)) %>% 
  filter(grade == "C")
```

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Number of Restaurants with C ratings by Borough

```{r plot_grade_c}
rest_inspec %>% 
  count(boro) %>% 
  mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~n, color = ~boro, rype = "bar")
  
```
